start: Hey there, I'm an animal wiki bot, which animal would you like to know more about?
repeat-please: I couldn't understand which animal you want to learn about, can you repeat please?
I missed that, can you repeat please?
Which animal do you want to know about?
animal-unknown: I am sorry but I don't know the {animal}.
Sorry but never heard of the {animal}.
